text: Arthur Salm (4 March 1904 – 28 July 1988)Background notes on The Roll of Distinguished Philatelists September 2011, Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Trust, London, 2011. Archived here. was an American philatelist who was added to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists in 1980. At Muchen '73 he won the Grand Prix National for his collection of Thurn and Taxis. ==References== Category:Signatories to the Roll of Distinguished Philatelists Category:1904 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American philatelists
title: Arthur Salm
